content:
bjorn3 commented on Issue #2155:

I suspect it was used in legalizations where needed

Yes, that is the reason it exists. They should only be generated by legalizations when using vector sizes bigger than the biggest natively supported vector size and it is not possible to immediately legalize those vconcat/vsplit at that point.
